<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mage Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=5830) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 79 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[superstition instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=13)

**Requirements**
You’ve seen the target [Cast a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=2734).

</column>

---

You use your hatred of magic to lash out at a known spellcaster. Make a melee Strike against the required creature. If you hit and deal damage, the target is [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=94), or stupefied 2 on a critical hit, until the beginning of your next turn.
